abstract: Two severed heads are found on busy highways near Defense Ministry in Mexico City, reminder that capital has not entirely escaped violence sweeping large parts of country.
snippet: Two severed heads were found on a busy highway near the Defense Ministry in Mexico City on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Two severed heads were found on a busy highway near the Defense Ministry in Mexico City on Monday.

headline.main: Mexico: Severed Heads Found in Capital
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Severed Heads Found in Capital
